rules_text: Whenever Herald of Heroes deals combat damage to a player, reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature card with power 2 or less from among them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor_text:
[i]“Defiance is to be expected from the bold, but the disrespect shown by the emissary rattled the Emperor.”
—Azamir, “Fall Of Golden Company”[/i]
